title: Ranked Matchmaking
body:
There are a lot of threads already about this but why not add another? This is a huge problem... Curiously, after losing game after game where my team gets stomped I decided to do research into what my teammates were vs the enemies and look at these forums.  Surprise, Surprise! Last 3 games the team I got was worse than the enemy team. One of my last 3 ranked games, the enemies had over 4k total wins, while my teams was around 900, with mine being 828 of those...

Been playing LoL ranked since S2, made Gold S3 and I was high Plat by S6 - quit after having a consistently terrible solo experience and hitting that ceiling where I couldn't get to diamond because of plat players thinking they know how to play the game.  I decided to try to pick it up and see if I could enjoy ranked solo at all. I know my account decayed and the reset happened. But ... why am I in Silver 2? I think, oh well you know with enough time I can get up easily right? I carried myself out I can do it again! Haha!  I have tried and played every role. No matter where I go, it doesn't matter. This elo shouldn't even exist IMO. It's been a joke to watch look up my team; here is my last one:

2 of my teammates are unranked for last 2 seasons. Can you guess the result?
http://tinypic.com/view.php?pic=2ro2snm&s=9#.WWLi84jyuUk
https://na.op.gg/summoner/userName=l4ndm1n3

Just enjoy and relish those last 3 games. Fun!

Done with ranked and this game yet again. Not sure what this game company is basing their matchmaking off of - it is beyond broken. I will never spend money on this game and no casual player should. Since I last played, it's now clearly a cash grab as well over - everything is RP now, nothing for IP - over 100k and nothing to spend it on. Good luck getting my money!
